tech_news.title: Microsoft just issued a second emergency OS update for Windows 11 this month - Windows Central
tech_news.description: Another out of band update has been issued to Windows 11 users to address a major bug that caused Outlook to become inoperable after January's disastrous Patch Tuesday updates.

tech_news.title: Woman Tries To Buy Honda. The Manager Refuses Unless She Agrees To A Date. Then He Adds $10,000 To The Price After She Says No - Motor1.com
tech_news.description: A woman says a Honda sales manager refused to sell her a car unless she agreed to a date. When she declined, he added $10K to the price. What now?
